name: Splatter (itch)
description:
Splatter is a run and gun action game. Shot and slash your way through groups of enemies and create colourful artwork with their blood.

Combat System

Shoot enemies to make streaks of blood, slash them to makes blood explosions from their bodies, deflect enemies’ bullets to completely splatter them.

Boss Fights

Fight your way through the level and fight the boss at the end to win.
